title: Fine Tune a Small Language Model using MLX
description: Train a Llama 3.2 1B model to understand and answer questions about Touch Rugby rules using the MLX framework. Perfect for rule-based question answering.
notes:
# MLX Fine-Tuning Notes

## Overview
This recipe fine-tunes a Llama 3.2 1B model specifically for Touch Rugby rules using the MLX framework.

## Important Considerations
- MLX is optimized for Apple Silicon (M1/M2/M3 chips)
- The dataset contains Touch Rugby rules in Q&A format
- Model size is kept small (1B parameters) for efficient inference

## Training Tips
- Monitor loss curves carefully
- Use appropriate LoRA rank (typically 8-64)
- Validate on unseen rugby scenarios

## Expected Outcomes
After training, the model should be able to answer questions about:
- Touch Rugby rules and regulations
- Game procedures and scoring
- Player positions and responsibilities
